article.title: U.S. Air Force Modifies Space-Based Infrared Systems Contract
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Space Systems Co., Sunnyvale, Calif., is being awarded a $58,408,979 contract modification for the Space Based Infrared Systems Follow-on Production Program. The contracting activity is the Space and Missile Systems Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, Calif.
